name: Ivy Cudgel
description: You strike with an ivy-wrapped cudgel. Make a melee attack, dealing 4d4 + MOVE grass damage on a hit. When used by Ogerpon, the type of this attack and damage changes to that of the mask it is wearing:
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
